page.title: 04FROM A KENT VILLAGE KITCHEN
page.content: My family are coming to Sunday lunch, which will be a traditional {roast}of New Zealand{lamb,}mint{sauce, {peas, carrots, cabbage}and{potatoes. {Pudding}will be{apple pie}and{custard. An{electric cooker}and{fridge}are two of the appliances which have made life easier in my{kitchen. {Diet}is important to us. We try to eat less{sugar, starch}and{dairy}pro_ ducts, but more{fibre. Salads}are a favourite meal, while{freezers}enable us to have a variety of{meat, vege_ {tables}and{fruit}throughout the year. Foreign holidays and immigration have brought new foods to our menu:_ {pasta, curries, burgers}and{Chinese. These add to the normal{roasts, stews, {grills, pies, puddings}and{cheeses. { }The favourite hot drinks are{tea}and {coffee. Soft drinks, beer}and{wine}are also enjoyed.
